languages.text: "Вот балда! Сколько раз ей повторять — конденсат с воздуходувов надо пить, а не эту дрянь!"

traits.locale_text: "Вот балда! Сколько раз ей повторять – конденсат с воздуходувов надо пить, а не эту дрянь!"

languages.text: "The fool! How many times do I have to tell her? You drink the condensate from the capacitors, not that sludge!"
languages.original_text: "Вот балда! Сколько раз ей повторять — конденсат с воздуходувов надо пить, а не эту дрянь!"

traits.locale_text: "What a fool! How many times should I tell her — condensate from the capacitors should be drunk, not this sludge!"
"What a fool! How many times should I tell her — condensate from the capacitors should be drunk, not this sludge!"
"The fool! How many times do I have to tell her? You drink the condensate from the capacitors, not that sludge!"
"The fool! How many times do I have to tell her? You drink the condensate from the capacitors, not that sludge!"

languages.text: 「あのバカ！いったい何度言えば…飲めるのはコンデンサのコンデンセートで、このヘドロじゃないって！」
languages.original_text: "The fool! How many times do I have to tell her? You drink the condensate from the capacitors, not that sludge!"

traits.locale_text: 「あのバカ！いったい何度言えばーー飲めるのはコンデンサのコンデンセートで、このヘドロじゃないって！」

languages.text: « Mais quelle imbécile ! Combien de fois je vais devoir lui répéter... C'est le condensat des condensateurs qu'il faut boire, pas cette gadoue ! »
languages.original_text: "The fool! How many times do I have to tell her? You drink the condensate from the capacitors, not that sludge!"

traits.locale_text: « Mais quelle imbécile ! Combien de fois je vais devoir lui répéter... C'est le condensat des liquéfacteurs qu'il faut boire, pas cette gadoue ! »

languages.text: “真是个蠢货！我到底得和她说多少遍才行？要喝电容器的冷凝水，不能喝里面的泥巴！”
languages.original_text: "The fool! How many times do I have to tell her? You drink the condensate from the capacitors, not that sludge!"

traits.locale_text: “她可真是个蠢货！我和她说过多少次了？要喝电容器的冷凝水，不能喝下水道里的泥巴！”

languages.text: "Was für eine Närrin! Wie oft muss ich es ihr noch sagen? Man trinkt das Kondenswasser von den Kondensatoren, nicht diese Brühe!"
languages.original_text: "The fool! How many times do I have to tell her? You drink the condensate from the capacitors, not that sludge!"

traits.locale_text: "Was für eine Närrin! Wie oft muss ich es ihr noch sagen? Man trinkt das Kondenswasser von den Kondensatoren, nicht diese Brühe!"

languages.text: «¡Es imbécil! ¿Cuántas veces le tengo que decir que lo potable es el líquido de los condensadores, no esa asquerosidad?».
languages.original_text: "The fool! How many times do I have to tell her? You drink the condensate from the capacitors, not that sludge!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Es imbécil! ¿Cuántas veces le tengo que decir que lo que podemos beber es el líquido de los condensadores, no esa asquerosidad?».

languages.text: "Geri zekâlı karı! Otuz kez dedim. Kondansatörlerden gelen yoğuşma suyunu içeceksin, o çamuru değil!"
languages.original_text: "The fool! How many times do I have to tell her? You drink the condensate from the capacitors, not that sludge!"

traits.locale_text: "Ahmak! Kaç kez söylemem gerekiyor? Kondansatörlerden gelen yoğuşma suyu varken çamur içmeye ne gerek var!"
